forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. Southwest wind 3 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under a sunny sky, where warmth dances just above the 60-degree mark. The gentle westerly breeze carries with it the fresh scent of the bay, while clarity reigns, providing an unyielding view over the city, punctuated by the iconic silhouette of the Golden Gate Bridge against the azure expanse. As sunlight bathes the streets in a warm glow, one can sense the vibrancy of the day; it feels pleasantly inviting, with the distant contour of the Marin headlands shimmering in the sun’s embrace.

The evening promises a shift as the sun softly retreats, leaving space for an understudy of clouds to sweep across the sky. Dress in layers, perhaps a light sweater to embrace the cool evening air. As twilight descends, the city will exude a serene charm, perfect for leisurely strolls through the neighborhood streets or quiet gatherings in local cafes. This blend of sun and the impending crispness evokes a sense of peaceful transition—an ideal day to unwind, reflect, and soak in the beauty of urban life enfolded by nature’s gentle rhythm.
